A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Incredible film. Don't go in hoping for your fan fiction to come true (like many of these audience reviews apparently) because this movie will upend your expectations. It pushes the series forward and out of the \"safe\" murk it's been stuck in somewhat lately. This is the rare film that you know when you see it that people 20 years from now will wonder what \"fans\" could possibly have been thinking when they were outraged over this.
